column2: Lincoln Project Still Playing Mind Games With Ad On Trump's Favorite Channel
column5: The Lincoln Project is still playing mind games with Donald Trump â€” and their latest ad is playing on his local stations. Via the Palm Beach Post: The group's latest ad launching Thursday touts Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell as the true respected leader of the Republican Party. The ad claims that Josh Holmes McConnell's former chief of staff who hosts a popular conservative podcast called Ruthless "acts like you (Trump) are a nobody and laughs about how Mitch ignores you." A spokesperson for The Lincoln Project said the group decided to launch the campaign in Palm Beach County knowing that Trump is an avid viewer of programs on Fox News including the Fox and Friends morning show when the ad will air.
